original_title: Phineas and Ferb: Night of the Living Pharmacists
overview: Doofenshmirtz's latest "-inator" accidentally turns the citizens of Danville into contagious mindless repulsive pharmacists that look like him who run rampant all over town. Perry and the gang must work together to save Danville and avoid becoming mindless repulsive pharmacists themselves.
title: Phineas and Ferb: Night of the Living Pharmacists
